module.p:
Corpus examples –
[...] A nis, tha an Taghadh Nàiseanta seachad, agus tha Riaghaltas ùr againn. Tha sinn an dòchas gun téid gu math dhaibh, agus gun cuir iad spionnadh ás ùr anns an dùthaich air fad. Agus gu seachd àraidh anns a’ Ghaidhealtachd: gun tòisich obair an dealain a rithist, gun cuirear tuilleadh bhàtaichean-iasgaich an sàs, gum faigh na Gaidheil cothrom air fearann na Gaidhealtachd obrachadh dhaibh fhéin, ás bith an ann mar chroitean no mar innis no mar choille, gun bhacadh o bhàllidh no o thighearna. Tha sinn an dòchas gun tig rathaidean ùra, chan ann dìreach gu feum an luchd-turais, ach gu feum nan Gaidheal. [...] ’Se glé bheag de chobhair a thug a’ Phàrlamaid a riamh do ’n Ghàidhlig no do fhoghlum agus do litreachas na Gàidhlig. Cuin a chualas ball-Pàrlarnaid a’ togail a ghuth a dh’ iarraidh leasachaidh do staid Gàidhlig ann an Albainn? Am bi cothrom a nis aig cuideigin a ghuth a thogail, anns an t-suidheachadh iongantach a th’ againn anns a’ Phàrlamaid ùr?
[...] Now, the General Election is behind us, and we have a new Government. We hope that they will do well, and that they will re-energise the whole country. And most especially in the Highlands: that electricity work will restart, that more fishing boats will be put into service [?], that the Gaels will get the opportunity to work the land of the Highlands for themselves, whether as crofts or as grazing or as forest, without hindrance from a bailiff or from a laird. We hope that new roads will come, not just to benefit tourists, but to benefit the Gaels. [...] The Parliament has given very little assistance ever to the Gaelic language or to Gaelic education and literature. When has a member of Parliament been heard raising his voice to demand improvement for the state of Gaelic in Scotland? Will someone have an opportunity now to raise his voice, in the unexpected situation we have in the new Parliament? td. 9, ‘Air an Spiris’
Tha An Comunn Gaidhealach a’ bruidhinn air Seanaileir ùr a thaghadh a bhios os cionn obair a’ Chomuinn. [...] Bhiodh a leòr aige ri dhèanamh an toiseach ag ath-nuadhachadh dreach a’ Chomuinn. Tha móran ri dhèanamh ris a’ Mhòd mus beir e air linn an telebhisean, no eadhon air linn an réidio: bu mhath gun cuirte luchd-sgrìobhaidh is luchd-ciùil an sàs ann a bhith a’ cruthachadh ás ùr, an àite bhith an còmhnaidh a’ cur seòrsa de dhreach ùr air seann rudan; tha co-fharpaisean ùra ann an litreachas, ann an ceòl, ann an dràma is ann an ealain a dhìth air a’ Mhòd. Tha cumadh ùr a dhìth air na co-fharpaisean is air na cuirmean-ciùil. [...] Tha cumadh, is dreach, is brìgh ùr a dhìth air leabhraichean, ’s air mìosachan a’ Chomuinn. Ach dh’ fheumadh am Fear-stiùiridh ùr barrachd air a sin a dhèanamh.
The Highland Society is talking about choosing a new General who will oversee the Society’s work. [...] He would have enough to do initially reforming the Society. There is much to do at the Mod before it catches up with ?? the era of television, or even with the era of radio: writers and musicians should be involved in creating afresh, instead of always putting a sort of new form on old things; new competitions in literature, in music, in drama and in art are needed at the Mod. The competitions and the concerts need a new format. [...] The Society’s books and monthly magazines need a new format, design and substance. But the new leader would have to do more than (just) that. td. 105, ‘Air an Spiris’

Corpus examples –
[...] A nis, tha an Taghadh Nàiseanta seachad, agus tha Riaghaltas ùr againn. Tha sinn an dòchas gun téid gu math dhaibh, agus gun cuir iad spionnadh ás ùr anns an dùthaich air fad. Agus gu seachd àraidh anns a’ Ghaidhealtachd: [...]
[...] Now, the General Election is behind us, and we have a new Government. We hope that they will do well, and that they will re-energise the whole country. And most especially in the Highlands: [...] td. 9, ‘Air an Spiris’
Tha An Comunn Gaidhealach a’ bruidhinn air Seanaileir ùr a thaghadh a bhios os cionn obair a’ Chomuinn. [...] Bhiodh a leòr aige ri dhèanamh an toiseach ag ath-nuadhachadh dreach a’ Chomuinn. Tha móran ri dhèanamh ris a’ Mhòd mus beir e air linn an telebhisean, no eadhon air linn an réidio: bu mhath gun cuirte luchd-sgrìobhaidh is luchd-ciùil an sàs ann a bhith a’ cruthachadh ás ùr, an àite bhith an còmhnaidh a’ cur seòrsa de dhreach ùr air seann rudan [...]
The Highland Society is talking about choosing a new General who will oversee the Society’s work. [...] He would have enough to do initially reforming the Society. There is much to do at the Mod before it catches up with ?? the era of television, or even with the era of radio: writers and musicians should be involved in creating afresh, instead of always putting a sort of new form on old things [...] td. 105, ‘Air an Spiris’
cf. tòisich às ùr start afresh, resume.
